alert.note: Alert for Okmulgee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 13 at 1:37PM CDT until May 13 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...THE FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN OKMULGEE COUNTY... At 135 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicates that at least brief heavy rain remains possible across the warned area. Flash flooding may be ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other drainage and low lying areas. Some locations that may experience flooding include... Okmulgee... Beggs... Preston... Okmulgee State Park... Liberty... Hectorville... FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
